El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por esta criatura no se puede reducir por debajo del 50 %.

El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por esta criatura no se puede reducir por debajo del 50 %.

languages.text: この生き物に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されたターゲットは、−40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。この生き物による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、50%以下にならない。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.

traits.locale_text: この生き物に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されたターゲットは、−40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。この生き物による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、50%以下にならない。

languages.text: 被此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会被降至50%以下。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.

traits.locale_text: 被此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会被降至50%以下。

languages.text: -<indent=5%>Von dieser Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −40 belegt oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.</indent> Von dieser Kreatur verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} kann nicht unter 50 % gesenkt werden.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.

traits.locale_text: -<indent=5%>Von dieser Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -40 belegt oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.</indent> Von dieser Kreatur verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} kann nicht unter 50 % gesenkt werden.

languages.text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par cette créature doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par cette créature ne peuvent pas être réduits de plus de 50 %.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par cette créature doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par cette créature ne peuvent pas être réduits de plus de 50 %.

languages.text: Bu yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler, −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}. Bu yaratığın verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, %50'nin altına düşürülemez.
